title: Apple Watch Series 9 Black Friday Deals (2023) - Spending Lab

content.background: Black Friday 2023 is approaching, and the Apple Watch Series 9 is expected to be a popular choice among shoppers looking for exclusive deals on the latest tech gadgets. The Series 9 offers enhanced features such as an ECG app, larger display, improved sleep tracking, and advanced fitness monitoring. It represents Apple's commitment to innovation and user-centric design.
content.summary: This article highlights the top early Apple Watch Series 9 deals for Black Friday 2023, focusing on savings on the GPS and GPS + Cellular models. The Apple Watch Series 9 is a pinnacle of wearable technology with its standout features, and Black Friday offers consumers a chance to upgrade their tech arsenal at a more affordable price point.

content.background: Cyber Monday offers significant savings on various products, including MacBooks. MacBooks are known for their quality and innovation, featuring advanced chips, stunning displays, and other impressive features. This article highlights the best MacBook sales available during Cyber Monday 2023 from retailers like Apple, Amazon, Best Buy, and B&H.
content.summary: The article provides a list of the top MacBook deals available during Cyber Monday 2023. It includes discounts on MacBook models like MacBook Air and MacBook Pro, with upgraded chips and improved performance. The deals cover different display sizes and storage capacities, catering to various user needs. The article recommends checking the New York Post Shopping section for more content.

title: Osun APC, Adeleke disagree over first-year scorecard

content.background: The opposition All Progressives Congress in Osun State has alleged that Governor Ademola Adeleke travelled abroad ahead of the first anniversary of his administration to avoid giving an account of his stewardship. The Osun APC accused Adeleke of running the state aground and mismanaging the state's revenue. Adeleke's spokesperson claimed that his administration surpassed its targets in various sectors.
content.summary: The Osun State APC has accused Governor Adeleke of fleeing abroad to avoid being accountable for his first-year performance. They criticized him for incompetence and mismanagement of funds. However, Adeleke's spokesperson defended the governor, stating that his administration has achieved beyond its set targets in areas such as infrastructure, education, healthcare, and technology.
